ComicInfo.Summary:
Tales for the bold. Ideas for the strange. Ulises Farinas, Erick Freitas, and a cavalcade of new talents bring to life amazing fantastical tales: A killer virus! Cowboxing! Astronauts lost in space! And Santa’s worst nightmare!
